name: SearchStripeProducts
description:
Search for previously created products on Stripe.

Use this tool to search for products you have created on Stripe. It utilizes Stripe's Search Query Language for querying. Note that the search may not be suitable for transactions needing strict consistency, as data may be slightly outdated. Also, this service isn't available in India.

parameters.name: search_query_string
parameters.description: The search query string to find products. Refer to Stripe's Search Query Language for syntax and available fields.

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for products](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-products).

parameters.name: response_fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of specific fields to expand in the response for detailed information. Use field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: results_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of product results to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Defaults to 10 if not set.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for paginating through the results. Use the 'next_page' value from the previous response for subsequent pages. Do not include this on the first call.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for products](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-products).

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for products](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-products).
